## Instructions
- Please fill all **bold** fields above before creating the PR.
- All fields are mandatory. If not applicable, fill `NA`.
- Keep single-line fields (Channels, Headless, etc.) on one line.
- Use multi-line areas for Commando Brief and Comments.
